Package com.arjuna.CosTransactions.Interposition

Interface Summary
OTS_FactoryCreator Different transaction factories can be added dynamically to the system to deal with specific interposition types.
 

Class Summary
OTS_FactoryList Maintains the list of known transaction interposition factories.
OTS_ServerControl As with OTS_Control, the transaction is maintained until the control object is deleted.
OTS_ServerFactory This is a server-side factory used for creating server transactions.
OTS_ServerTransaction This looks like an OTS_Transaction, but is only create for interposition purposes.
